title: LSÂ´ Thoughts on why Riot is not to blame for the current meta / patch

embed.description: I recently saw an overwhelming amount of complaints regarding the current "boring meta" and blaming of Riot for anti-snowballing. This video discusses how if we look at history, especially of other eSports tiltes, Riot isn't to blame at all.

body: Well thought out and well spoken thoughts on the recent patches.

replies.body: What in the {{champion:103}} balls is this guy talking about, the game is boring? They're aren't any bloody fights? The game is slow? What game are you playing? Since they made the changes to dragon and added rift herald, there have been many more fights and skirmishes

he didnt say they were boring actually... if u actually paied attention u would have heard him say that this was a response to other people's opinion so if u wanna argue if the game is boring or not go on reddit and argue with the people that got posts on front page talkin about how boring thr game is. it is to those people he is answering. he doesnt find it boring himself.
He doesn't mean the game game. He means "Game". League in general being boring, slow etc.

He is just a kid.

The Meta is Tanky DPS and its been that way for a while.
Yeah, no thanks --- nothing that androgyne has to say about any topic is worth enduring that face and hair"style"
